title: What are the registration fees for the SET entrance exam? - Quora

response.answer_text: SET-2018 will be held online on Saturday, May 5, 2018 and is further divided into following exams: Symbiosis Law Admission Test (SLAT)Symbiosis Entrance Exam for Design (SEED)SIT Engineering Entrance Exam (SITEEE)SET - GeneralSET-2018 will be conducted in two sessions: Morning and Afternoon. Here is the whole schedule:  A candidate may take more than one paper. However, he/she will have to choose and register for one paper from the morning session (SLAT/SEED) and/or one paper from the afternoon session (SET/SITEEE). Talking about registration fees: Entrance Test fee is Rs.1750/- for each test.If you are registering for one test in the morning (SLAT/SEED) and one test in the afternoon (SET/SITEEE), the fees are Rs. 3500. (1750X2) Registrations for SET-2018 are open now. Complete your registrations before 14 April, 2018. To apply visit: Official SET Website
